title: Data Package For Transit Accessibility Analysis in Selected Canadian Metropolitan Areas
text: basic example shows solve common problem: Load travel time table employment Halifax: median travel time minutes origins destinations Halifax : Simple features objects cartography also included. example, Quebec: Plot population Dissemination Area:
code: library(canaccessR) library(ggplot2) library(sf) #> Linking to GEOS 3.12.1, GDAL 3.8.4, PROJ 9.4.0; sf_use_s2() is TRUE data(travel_matrix_emp_hal) median(travel_matrix_emp_hal$travel_time_p50) #> [1] 65 data("census_data_da_que") ggplot() +   geom_sf(data = census_data_da_que,           aes(fill = Population)) +   scale_fill_fermenter(palette = "Reds",                        direction = 1) +   theme_minimal()

what: Travel time matrix and employment statistics for Calgary Metropolitan Area. — travel_matrix_emp_cal
title: Travel time matrix and employment statistics for Calgary Metropolitan Area. — travel_matrix_emp_cal
text: data frame origin-destination pairs, travel time transit, population employment Census Dissemination Area. Census Dissemination Areas (DAs) smallest publicly available geography provided Statistics Canada.
